unpublishedAction.name: agent_shift

actionConfiguration.body:
select 
ag.agent_id,
ag.agent_name,
ag.agent_status,
ag.area_zone,
ash.active_time,
ash.inactive_time,
SUBSTR(cast(cast(ash.inactive_time as timestamp)-cast(ash.active_time as timestamp) as text),0,9) as working_hours
from agent as ag
left join agent_shift_history as ash on ag.agent_id=ash.agent_id
WHERE
to_char(ash.created_time ,'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000') >=
to_char(date({{from_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 00:00:000')  
and 
to_char(ash.created_time ,'yyyy-mm-dd 23:59:999')<=
to_char(date({{to_date.formattedDate}}),'yyyy-mm-dd 23:59:999')
order by ash.id desc;

invalids: 'Query timeout' field must be an integer between 0 and 60000
